original_text:
And they ate and drank before the Lord on that day with great gladness.
And they made Solomon the son of David king the second time, and they anointed him as prince for the Lord, and Zadok as priest.
korean_text: 이 날에 무리가 크게 기뻐하여 여호와 앞에서 먹으며 마셨더라

sentences.original_text: before the Lord on that day
And they made Solomon the son of David king
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 다윗의 아들 솔로몬을 왕으로 삼았고

sentences.original_text: and they anointed him as prince for the Lord,
